name: PeanutButterJar
0:
”Alexa open peanut butter jar”
”Give me a sweet recipe”
”Give me a savory recipe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peanut butter jar
des: For years, we at the National Peanut Board have been growing and spreading America’s love for peanuts. Suffice to say, we know peanuts… and REALLY love peanut butter. So we put tons of our favorite peanut butter-y recipes into this, our Peanut Butter Jar! Choose between sweet and savory recipes, or leave it to us… then have a randomly selected recipe sent directly to your Alexa app. Just enable the skill and say, “Alexa, open Peanut Butter Jar.” Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
